name: Jean-Christophe Boullion
introduction: Jean-Christophe "Jules" Boullion is a former French Formula One driver, who drove for Sauber for parts of 1995. He was signed as a Williams test driver, and was loaned to Sauber to replace Karl Wendlinger for much of the season. Boullion scored points twice in eleven races, enough for 16th in the Championship.
